name: Asteroids (itch) (Nel549)
description:
A game made for the ,,Curious Game Jam 2020"

-Game

Asteroids is a game created by Atari in released in 1979.The game is about a spaceship (the player) wich must destroy the asteroids to gain points,if you collide with an asteroid you lose a health point,there are also alien spaceships the can attack you

-Controls:

WASD or ArrowKeys for movement, space to shoot and mouse for rotation

Enjoy
